rh:help.rh:title: Add the pkg attribute to each r:func element in the XML document

rh:description.para: This function is used to provide complete meta-information for references to R functions that the author has supplied in brief form. The function finds all XML elements named r:func which have no pkg attribute. For each such node, it then determines the package in which the corresponding function resides and adds the packages name as the pkg attribute.

rh:arg.para: the XML document whose contents are to be updated.
